title: About
text:
Hello,
Am Forgive Agbesi, but prefare to be called Akosua
I am a diligent, resourceful and enthusiastic person I have extensive experience in ERP Systems with a strong background in software development I have the passion for creating efficient, scalable, and maintainable applications. Proficient in X++, C# and the.NET framework, with expertise in designing and implementing complex software solutions. I Adept at collaborating with cross-functional teams to analyze requirements, architect solutions, and deliver high-quality software on time. Experienced in various software development methodologies, including Agile and Scrum.
I am continuously staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to ensure the development of cutting-edge solutions. Strong problem-solving skills and a commitment to writing clean, well-documented code.
I have a BSC in Information Technology from the university of Ghana, Currently, am persuing my masters in the University of British Columbia, Master of Data Science.
I love reading comics and not forgetting choral music.
Join me as i exploy how to merge the powers of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) tools with data science for better business processes.
